description: Dive into "Phuket Town's Malls: A Shopper's Paradise" ‚Äî a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Phuket Town's Malls: A Shopper's Paradise

places.generalDescription: Central Phuket Festival is a massive multi-level shopping mall located just outside Phuket Town. It boasts over 120 outlets, offering a wide range of products and services to cater to every shopper's needs. The mall features international brands, boutique stores, apparel shops, and more. Additionally, visitors can enjoy the first-class cinema experience at SFX, which showcases Hollywood blockbusters, Thai releases, and Bollywood films with modern digital sound technology and VIP seating options.

sources.snippet: Central Festival is a massive multi-level shopping mall, sprawling just outside Phuket Town. The complex has over 120 outlets, catering to every customer service imaginable and making it the dream destination for shopping in Phuket. There are many international brands, boutique stores, and apparel shops which are up-to-date on everything from cloth (Read More)ing, silk products, raw cloth, bedding, and household goods, to children's toys.
sources.shortName: 11 Shopping Malls in Phuket

sources.snippet: As Phuket‚Äôs premier shopping destination in Phuket sitting on the Vichitsongkram Road, Central Phuket offers a blend of international and local brands. This massive shopping complex is divided into 2 wings; Central Festival and Central Floresta. Central Festival is a sprawling complex with department stores, fashion outlets, a cinema, and an ice-skating rink.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Spots to Go Shopping in Phuket: Your Getaway Shopping Spree!

sources.snippet: Central Phuket stands as a colossal mall, a true haven for avid shoppers. Here, you‚Äôll find an extensive range of both international and local brands, creating an absolute paradise for those seeking retail therapy. Whether you‚Äôre into fashion or electronics, Central Phuket has it all conveniently housed under one expansive roof.
sources.shortName: Phuket‚Äôs 13 Best Shopping Malls We Keep Coming Back To [2025 ]

sources.snippet: Besides exploring the historical monuments, have you gone shopping yet?. What you waiting for?. A huge multi-level shopping mall, located outside the town of Phuket, central festival Phuket is home to over 120 outlets, that offers people the ideal shopping experience of a lifetime.
sources.shortName: Top 8 Malls In Phuket To Escape The Heat And Enjoy A Day Of Shopping

sources.snippet: Central Festival is located in Phuket town which is the largest shopping mall in Phuket. It is also called Central Department Store. It is a large shopping mall with supermarkets, restaurants, furniture, home appliances, snacks, and so on.
sources.shortName: Top 8 Shopping Places in Phuket, What to Buy in Phuket

sources.snippet: Night markets: The night markets in Phuket are a sight to behold on their own. Often packed with locals and tourists alike, you will find anything from souvenirs, handicrafts, clothes, jewelry, antiques, street food and even pets.
sources.shortName: Phuket Shopping Guide | Thailand

sources.snippet: Central Phuket Floresta sounds like another mall on the island but is just a massive extension of the good old Central Festival and the twp wings combined cover an immense surface, on 3 and 4 levels ...
sources.shortName: Phuket Town Shopping

sources.snippet: Central Festival Phuket is the largest department store in Phuket Town. It is a comprehensive shopping mall with shopping, dining and entertainment.
sources.shortName: Top 10 Shopping Malls In Phuket
Central Phuket - The Island‚Äôs Premier Shopping Destination

places.name: Central Phuket

reviews.text:
Central Phuket Festival has evolved from the original Central Festival Phuket, which opened in 2004, into a larger complex that includes Central Floresta.

The expansion, which began in 2013 and resumed in 2016, added a new luxury wing, Central Floresta, and connected it to the existing Central Festival building via a bridge. Central Phuket aims to provide a world-class shopping and entertainment experience, integrating local culture with global trends.

Here's a more detailed look at the history:

Central Festival Phuket (Original):
Opened in 2004, it was a significant retail and entertainment destination in Phuket.

Expansion Plans:
In 2013, plans were announced to expand the complex, but construction was delayed.

Resumption of Construction:
Construction resumed in 2016, with the goal of creating a larger, more luxurious shopping and entertainment complex.

Central Floresta:
The new wing, Central Floresta, was designed to connect with the existing Central Festival building, creating a larger, unified space.

Concept:
Central Phuket aims to offer a "World Comes to Play" experience, combining premium shopping, entertainment, and attractions.

Luxury Focus:
Central Floresta is positioned as a more luxurious space, catering to a clientele seeking leading brands and world-class experiences.

Integration of Culture and Trends:
Central Phuket plays a role in integrating local traditions with global trends, reflecting Phuket's development as a sought-after international destination.

During my visit to Thailand in 2022, I stayed at a hotel across the street and visited this mall frequently. It reminded me of home but with its own Thai twist. It isn't any average mall! They've got a movie theatre, aquarium, among many other things. There is lots of shops, both high end and affordable options. I especially love their food court which is presented as a street market.

Super big Shopping Mall. I love the luxury vibe and the safety. The grocery store is the best, we have seen in Phuket so far. Fantastic, fresh fruits. Very nice vibe, especially with the beautiful fish pond inside. Super Relaxing.

places.generalDescription: Central Phuket Floresta is a modern and bustling multi-level mall that offers a wide variety of retailers and a food court. It is an expansive extension of the popular Central Festival, designed to address the growing population and alleviate overcrowding at the original location. The mall caters more to locals than tourists due to its location on the outskirts of Phuket town.

sources.snippet: Central Floresta, Central Festival, Jungceylon and Central Patong are among the largest malls on the island and have taken shopping and entertainment in Phuket to a whole new level. These shopping complexes feature a plethora of shops, restaurants, as well as cinemas and other entertainment. On a smaller scale are Robinson Department Store, Limelight Phuket and Boat Avenue.
sources.shortName: Department Stores & Shopping Malls Phuket - Shopping

sources.snippet: Central Floresta is an excellent choice for shopping in Phuket. The atmosphere of the new wing connected to Central Festival by a footbridge is lively. The modern building is air-conditioned and has many nooks decorated with tropical plants for sitting and relaxing.
sources.shortName: Central Phuket - The Island‚Äôs Premier Shopping Destination

places.name: Central Phuket

reviews.text: Super big Shopping Mall. I love the luxury vibe and the safety. The grocery store is the best, we have seen in Phuket so far. Fantastic, fresh fruits. Very nice vibe, especially with the beautiful fish pond inside. Super Relaxing.

We enjoyed our two trips here, I got my nails done at Sparkle they were great. We went in the M&S for some homely treats that we have been missing. The have two parts to the mall, high end luxury shops and then your more normal end shops. It was great there was a Sephora and Zara, as I use these often at home. Will be back again for some more shopping.

During my visit to Thailand in 2022, I stayed at a hotel across the street and visited this mall frequently. It reminded me of home but with its own Thai twist. It isn't any average mall! They've got a movie theatre, aquarium, among many other things. There is lots of shops, both high end and affordable options. I especially love their food court which is presented as a street market.

places.generalDescription: Limelight Phuket is a compact mall that offers a variety of amenities and activities. It features a supermarket, informal dining options, kids' activities, and even a massage place. The first floor houses Pint Factory, which boasts an impressive selection of craft beer, ales, and ciders. On the rooftop, Baba Nest provides an exclusive experience with panoramic views of the Andaman Sea.

sources.snippet: Apart from discovering the historical places of Phuket, tourists should go shopping at Limelight Avenue, one of the places to go in Thailand. It is a couple of minutes away from the old town in Phuket where one can escape the heat, and fill one's stomach with something to eat and drink. It is sprawled over 7,000 sq meters, filled with modern shopping and dining plazas.
sources.shortName: Top 8 Malls In Phuket To Escape The Heat And Enjoy A Day Of Shopping

sources.snippet: On a smaller scale are Robinson Department Store, Limelight Phuket and Boat Avenue. These are definitely worth checking out, especially if you are looking for clothes.
sources.shortName: Department Stores & Shopping Malls Phuket - Shopping
Phuket‚Äôs 13 Best Shopping Malls We Keep Coming Back To [2025 ]

places.name: Limelight Phuket

reviews.text:
We were staying very close by to this place, but didn't visit for a few days.
One day, my family and I had gone to explore the old town and were tired so thought of taking a break in this mall.
Surprisingly it was such a great relief.
The food court was awesome, I got to try many things. My child had ice cream, we had smoothies then different teas/ shakes.
We even relaxed for some time in the massaging chairs on the 1st floor (Thai 2nd floor).
Best part, it's right next to the aear of Indy Market, which is only 3 evenings in a week.
This area is highly recommended in Phuket.

üõçÔ∏è A Great Hangout Spot! üõçÔ∏è

This mall is a well-rounded destination with everything you need under one roof! From a spacious food court and amenities store to a pharmacy and a variety of essential products, it's both convenient and enjoyable.

Whether you're shopping, grabbing a bite, or just spending time with friends and family, it's a great place to hang out and unwind. üëç

#MallReview #ConvenientShopping #FoodCourtFun #PharmacyAccess #HangoutSpot
A little shopping mall with lots of restaurants, a food court, saloons, and the convenience store. Very good vibe and chill place.

places.generalDescription: Index Living Mall Phuket is a must-visit destination for friends and family in Thailand. The mall offers a wide range of products, from top-notch theater systems, artworks, bedding, and kitchenware to high-quality clothing brands and delectable cuisines at its restaurants. Located on Chalermprakiat Road near Big C, the top floor houses an Index furniture store with mass-produced furniture.

sources.snippet: When visiting the mall, people can visit shops that have some of the best theatre systems, artworks, bedding, and kitchenware. Of course, people can always shop for some of the best clothing brands, and treat their taste buds to some of the ideal cuisines served at the restaurants. These are some of the best things to do in Thailand with friends and family.
sources.shortName: Top 8 Malls In Phuket To Escape The Heat And Enjoy A Day Of Shopping

sources.snippet:
This furniture store and shopping mall is on Chalermprakiat Road just north 
      of Big C. The top floor is an Index furniture store. It is mass produced 
      furniture and not the sort of produce you would think of exporting from 
      Thailand. Downstairs is a small shopping mall including a nice Thai antiques 
      and handicrafts shop.
sources.shortName: Phuket - Shopping

sources.snippet: Customize your furniture at Phuket‚Äôs largest furniture mall, the Index Living Mall boasting the latest global home improvement trends. The first floor is dedicated to shops selling goods, the Oishi Japanese Buffet Restaurant, a mini coffee shop, and kitchenware stores. On the second floor are designer outlets such as Berlin Urbanloft.
sources.shortName: 11 Shopping Malls in Phuket
Phuket‚Äôs 13 Best Shopping Malls We Keep Coming Back To [2025 ]

places.name: Index Living Mall Phuket

reviews.text: Great service with khun Beer very diligent & so patient. Her colleagues with her were all so friendly & helpful...always gracious & smiling. Been shopping for 2 over years here with great joy & pleasure as usual. Thank you for the dessert!

I've been shopping here for a while, and while they have some nice items, the prices are consistently high, and the customer service is terrible. The staff gives conflicting information about discounts, and no one seems to know anything when you ask for help. Very frustrating experience-definitely not worth the hassle.

Please don't buy here. I bought a desktop chair in this shop, they didn't have in stock. I received my order and the welding of chair was not ok, I couldn't setup the chair.

I go to the shop but told me "We only sell, we don't have after-sales service. They told me that some service in bangkok will call me but they didn't. I come back with my thai friend to know what do, they try to acting to do something to finally say "Wait for customer service call you back, we only seller..."

One week I have this chair in my living room and nobody care.

They really nice to sell, but after that they make all their possible to not help you.

The most funny is when you go in shop, have 5 people to sell for only one small section, everyone in their phone, nobody help you.

100% better to go Index just in front of Square index. When I had trouble they help for for the after-service.

Square index only sell, take their commision and doesn't care of you after that.

Use Shopee or another shop instead.

places.generalDescription: Sizable grocery store with a wide range of goods, plus a food court & a restaurant.
places.name: Phuket Grocery

reviews.text: Very good prices! Also there's this cute little store in the mall that sells the best dresses, I bought a lot for church and it was very cheap. I definitely recommend!

This is like a Costco in Thailand üáπüá≠ without a membership.  It's also a small mall that has a pharmacy, KFC, PizzaHut and various independent vendors.  Plenty of free parking.  Easy to find just after the round about.  Can be very busy especially in the evening.

Great supermarket with cheap price. They have a lot variety goods and products, from cosmetics, bathroom utensils, food and drink, and home necessities. My weekly must visits during my 1 month stay in Phuket.

places.address: 54/51 Ongsimphai Rd, Talat Yai, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Big C Phuket is a massive retail hub that offers a wide array of products in a hypermarket atmosphere. It's the perfect spot for those seeking to purchase items in bulk or find great deals on various goods, including fresh produce, household essentials, souvenirs, and clothing. Additionally, visitors can enjoy a delightful breakfast and an assortment of hot and cold beverages at reasonable prices. The store is known for its cleanliness, ample space, and well-stocked shelves.

sources.snippet: Address:72 Chalermprakiat Ratchakan Thi 9 Road, Wichit, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand. Opening hours: Daily 8 AM to 10 PM
sources.shortName: Phuket‚Äôs 13 Best Shopping Malls We Keep Coming Back To [2025 ]

places.name: Big C Supercenter Phuket

reviews.text: The best place to buy souvenirs. Big C is a quite famous super market chain in Thailand and I have been to some of their shops. This is by far the biggest Big C store in my experience. Plenty kind of items are available in reasonable prices even for locals. No reason not to come here if you are traveler who have lots of friends, colleagues and families in your living place.

Large department store with wide choice that is bit better than average Lotus or 7-Eleven, but some more gourmet items like natural coffee beans or tea are limited in choice. Great beer selection, dome unusual tastes like coffee-infused beer:)
Prices are on par with 7-Eleven and bit higher than Lotus or something local like Supercheap.

Big C Supercenter in Phuket is a large, well-stocked local supermarket with a great variety of products, from groceries to household items to electronics. It's convenient and offers a wide range of both local and international brands. However, the prices here might not always be the cheapest compared to smaller local markets, so it's worth keeping that in mind if you're looking for budget-friendly options. Still, it's a solid choice for one-stop shopping, especially if you need a variety of goods.

places.address: 72 Chalermprakiat Ratchakan Thi 9 Road, Wichit, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand

places.generalDescription: The Oasis Thalang, previously known as ChimJae Walking Street and Vanich Walking Street, is a recently established narrow passage spanning 150 meters. It serves as a link between Thalang Road and Dibuk Road in the historic Phuket Town. This vibrant local market is sheltered and air-conditioned, offering an intriguing blend of shops and eateries. One highlight is The Oasis cafe coffee shop nestled within this unique space.

sources.snippet: A Walking Passage in Old Phuket Town The Oasis Thalang (formerly ChimJae Walking Street and Vanich Walking Street) is a new 150-metre-long narrow passage that connects Thalang Road to Dibuk Road in the old Phuket Town. This fun local market is covered ...
sources.shortName: Phuket Town Shopping

places.name: The Oasis Thalang

reviews.text:
Really interesting place....see how they used a gap between old building convert to tourist attraction.

The Oasis cafe coffee shop located inside in the middle of this area.
At phuket old town. If you are there give a quick looks, notting special
Nice Place but not much shop open on Songkran day.

places.generalDescription: Boat Avenue Phuket, located near Bang Tao Beach, is a vibrant outdoor shopping mall catering to tourists, expats, and affluent locals. The area boasts an array of shops, restaurants, cafes, boutiques, salons, massage parlors and bars. While parking can be challenging on weekends, the atmosphere is inviting with options for indoor and outdoor seating.
places.name: Boat Avenue Mall

reviews.text: This is a great area in Bang Tao (Laguna). It has loads of restaurants and other shops, as well as Villa Market supermarket (western style supermarket).
Nice little area to have an evening stroll through and grab some dinner.
Fun you got all wnat you need restaurant massage spa nail salon shopping bar Center of everything Friday market is fun night

places.generalDescription: Phuket Square is a vibrant indoor shopping destination that offers a delightful escape from the tropical heat, conveniently situated near the Royal Phuket City Hotel. This bustling mall features an array of stalls showcasing everything from trendy clothing and decorative items to furniture and household goods. Open daily until late, it‚Äôs the perfect spot for those looking to indulge in some retail therapy.

places.name: Phuket Square

reviews.text: Had a great time here! I got some Gucci shades with a dust cloth and case‚Ä¶ they have a variety of items‚Ä¶ Very reasonable suitcase sets‚Ä¶ prices are negotiable!

Disaster service in Phuket Square .

I went Phuket Square to buy a cup of milk tea at noon today .I had extremely disaster service experience in a store name" Beverage".

I just ask the staff:Can I have less ice inside my milk tea?  Then the staff show her attitude and shouted to me :No.

After she gave me the milk tea.She ask the card to charge again.Actually I gave my card to her before I get my drinks.

Because she is making tea while making a phone call.That's why she ask me twice.

It's totally fine if the staff can not or she doesn't  wanna put less ice inside my milk tea.At lest,BE COURTESY.

Her sales NO. is:260001.
Expensive..

places.generalDescription: Expo Phuket, located in the vibrant Patong Beach area, offers a diverse range of attractions. Visitors can enjoy the captivating displays of fruits, fish, and vegetables even if they're not into cooking. The spices and condiments section is particularly intriguing for its array of unfamiliar products. For those who prefer to avoid the meat corner, there's a delightful accessories and fashion section to explore.

sources.snippet: Explore a Local Bazaar in Phuket Town Expo Phuket is a very little-known covered bazaar found in Phuket Town, next to the newly renovated Novotel Phokeethra hotel. Expo Phuket is surprisingly vast and modern as it was also renovated recently.
sources.shortName: Phuket Town Shopping

places.name: Expo Phuket

reviews.text:
Nice local shopping mall, they sell some souvenirs, bags, shoes, clothes, work uniforms. Some prices are written, some are not - good place to shop for cheap.
Very nice set of clothes we bought for around 600baht we love it! Thank you miss Noth (in blue) for your patience and kind service!

Large indoor (covered) shopping complex with many stalls/shops/vendors inside. It was hot when we visited with the fans running but the doors were opened and the air condition not running.

There is a food court area to the southeast corner with inexpensive selections.
Lots of festive decorations,  clothes, fashion, ornaments, toys etc. Can bargains.  No AC. Easy food can find.
